title: In situ Pd-doped MoS2 nanosheets as an HER electrocatalyst for enhanced electrocatalytic water splitting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01459B, Paper
Jyoti Gupta, Dibakar Das, Pramod H. Borse, B. V. Sarada
In situ Pd doping in nanostructured MoS2 has been achieved with a simple and scalable one-step synthesis method. Induced sulfur vacancies, expanded interlayer spacing and 1T/2H phase formation allow efficient and stable HER during electrocatalytic water splitting in acidic, alkaline and sea water.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
